meanings.definition: To make or become less in size, amount, intensity, or degree.
meanings.sent1: She was decreasing her sugar intake for a healthier lifestyle.
meanings.sent2: The company decided to decrease the prices to attract more customers.
meanings.sent3: He was decreasing the volume of his voice to mimic a whisper.
